channel.description: CIS 527 What You'll Learn Lab 1 - Secure Workstations OS Installation & Configuration User Management & Permissions Services & Software Security CIS 225 Review Lab 2 - Configuration Management Configuration Management Puppet Quickstart Puppet Modules Working with Puppet Lab 1 redone using Puppet Lab 3 - Core Networking Services Networking Overview DHCP & DNS Email, HTTP, SNMP & More Wireshark CIS 525 Material with Sysadmin Twist Lab 4 - Directory Services Directory Services Overview Windows Domains Linux Networking Interoperability Single Sign-on Infrastructures - Hardest Lab!
